name: Project Nightmare
description:
What is this?

You are a pair of twins trying to defend your bed with your toys from things going bump in the night.

Our Goal

To create a more satisfying tower defense game that brings the wistfulness of fear from things going bump in the night.

Why now?

This is the perfect opportunity to explore a game genre that is quite niche and we may never be able to be advanced upon it for that reason.
